messages.subject: Samurai Miniature game development
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all, I am in the process of finding people who wish to contribute/help create/playtest a new set of tabletop wargames rules for the Samurai Wars. The
messages.messageBody:
Hi all,

I am in the process of finding people who wish to contribute/help
create/playtest a new set of tabletop wargames rules for the Samurai Wars.

The current scale will be 1/100th (15mm) and the game will be using a
core set of rules from a popular established game system with real
world financial backing.

Without having a great deal of knowledge on the history etc. I thought
the time period of mid/late 1500 to mid/late 1600 would be the best
time slice for the Samurai clan wars?

If any of you have played tabletop wargames (like DBM, Games Workshop,
Flames Of War, Ancients etc.) and think they could contribute in any
way please contact me off list thehornedgodslaine@...
